MAC Technology focuses on providing custom-designed Internet solutions that expand our clients’ fundamental business assets to advance productivity and enhance their relationships with customers, employees and partners. Our outsourcing services cover all phases of product lifecycle - conceptualization, development, integration, deployment and maintenance.

Our end-to-end business and technology consulting services help you define roadmap for your solutions and also bridge the gap between your end customer requirements and implementation. MAC delivers world class quality at a fraction of your current costs.

At MAC Technology Services Private Limited we always begin by thinking how our customers can receive comprehensive value for their budget. We are capable of executing IT related projects at fraction of the price that larger companies in Bangalore may charge and yet we always manage to deliver high quality results. At present MAC Technology Services Private Limited is providing high technology, end-to-end solutions in following fields:

* Web Solutions (design, programming and hosting)
* Custom Application Development
* Mobile Aps Development
* Product Development / ERP solutions
* IT & Technical Support
* IT Consulting / Resource Management
* Infrastructure Management Solutions
* e-Learning solutions / Flash

We can provide you with the people, processes, infrastructure, and tools that you need to run a high quality, low investment, outsourcing operation. Our customers can depend on us for integrated service that includes strategic consulting and customer research, software development, graphic design, as well as the development and implementation of world-class e-business solutions.

Our customer base is extremely diverse, as we are catering to myriad Small Businesses, medium sized Enterprises, and Consulting Organizations in vertical industry segments like Financial Services & Banking, Payment Processing, Insurance, Real Estate, Healthcare, Media & Entertainment, Retail and Technology.

We help our clients use technology to solve complex business/technology problems by leveraging the depth of our experience, domain expertise, and proven delivery capabilities. Our complete range of IT Services addresses the needs of both technology and business requirements to help organizations leverage leading-edge technologies for business improvement.
